alert.note: Alert for Burleson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 1:28PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Total ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Burleson County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of precipitation are expected with rain changing to freezing rain at times. The highest ice accumulations are expected near and northwest of Caldwell.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
